text: <@U2H3TT8F2> and anyone how do I add a Non-HubSpot Form to a HubSpot Website? Any help is much appreciated!
Hey <@U05BXLXQ3LZ> ! In your HubSpot account, you should be able to navigate to Marketing > Lead Capture > Forms. Then click the Form type dropdown menu and select Non-HubSpot

I am trying to retrieve Leads which were modified the previous day in Postman and unable to get correct response. Could you please help me in fixing the issue. I am using this endpoint in Postman.
<https://api.HubSpot.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts?limit=100&properties=firstname,lastname,company,email,phone,createdate,lastmodifieddate,website,hs_analytics_source,hs_lead_status&lastmodifieddate=2023-06-08&hs_lead_status=SQL&filters=(lastmodifieddate:equals:2023-06-06)|https://api.HubSpot.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts?limit=100&properties=firstname,lastn[â€¦]_lead_status=SQL&filters=(lastmodifieddate:equals:2023-06-06)>
Could you please send me the correct queryparameter to use for modified date field and lead status field. Thank you in advance.
I think you will need to use the /search endpoint with filterGroups/filters
Is there already an Inbound23 channel?
